scripts.dev2: concurrently "npm run delete_prisma && npm run cp_prisma && npm run build_dev" "npm run start_dev"
scripts.prisma:init: npx prisma migrate reset && npx ts-node ./api/seed/dummy.ts
scripts.prisma:init_demo: npx prisma migrate reset && npx ts-node ./src/seed/dummy_demo.ts
scripts.prisma:init_vercel: prisma generate && prisma migrate reset && npx ts-node ./src/seed/dummy.ts
scripts.build: prisma generate && prisma migrate reset --force && echo 'Start executing dummy.ts' && ts-node ./src/seed/dummy.ts && echo 'Finish executing dummy.ts'
scripts.build_bk1: prisma generate && prisma migrate reset --force && node ./dist/src/app.js
scripts.build_bk2: prisma generate && prisma migrate deploy --force && echo 'Start executing dummy.js' && node ./dist/src/seed/dummy.js && echo 'Finish executing dummy.js' && node ./dist/src/app.js && echo 'Execute app.js'
scripts.build_bk5: concurrently "prisma generate && prisma migrate reset --force && echo 'Start executing dummy.js' && node ./dist/src/seed/dummy.js && echo 'Finish executing dummy.js'" "echo 'Execute app.js' && ./dist/src/app.js"
